fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Instigator: When 2 players enter a Duel (that you can see), you may choose to make the loser take 3HP of damage instead. The loser will know that the Instigator increased the HP loss.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ruse: Pick a player. The next time they learn something (either from an ability or a card), it will be incorrect. Affects up to Susceptible checks. [Infinite uses, 3 CD]
- Smoke Bomb: Next phase, the playerlist will be hidden (position and health). That means any players that die this Night phase, will not be pronounced dead until the end of the following Day phase. [1 use, Unique, Night-Only]
- Scheme: Next phase, all attacks played by Chaos will appear to come from random non-Chaos members. [1 use, Unique] 
- Getaway: Choose a player. If they die from non-Event causes in this phase, they will live on 1 HP instead, with all status effects still applied. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D2, Locks D5]
